definition: A small, flat, typically round object made of metal, often used as a medium of exchange for goods and services. It is commonly used in financial transactions and can be found in various denominations.

examples.german: Ich habe eine Münze in meiner Tasche.
examples.english: I have a coin in my pocket.
The coin is made of gold.

examples.german: Er hat eine Münze in den Automaten geworfen.
examples.english: He inserted a coin into the vending machine.

examples.german: Die Münze hat einen Durchmesser von 2 cm.
examples.english: The coin has a diameter of 2 cm.
